import React, { useState } from 'react'; export default function TableItem(props) { const [EditMode, setEditMode] = useState(false); const [rowData,UpdateRowData] = useState({"Symbol":props.name,"price":20,"open":20,"close":20}) return (
{EditMode? : setEditMode((true))}>{rowData['Symbol']} }
{rowData['price']}
{rowData['open']}
{rowData['close']}
Regional Paradigm Technician
Optimization
Active Runner Imbalanced {EditMode? : "Admin"} {EditMode? : ""} ); }
